lead_paragraph: Miami point guard Goran Dragic had a game-high 25 points as the Heat advanced to the Eastern Conference semifinals by routing the Charlotte Hornets 106-73 in a deciding Game 7 on Sunday.

headline.print_headline: Dragic Stars as Heat Pound Hornets to Win Series
headline.main: Dragic Stars as Heat Pound Hornets to Win Series
